p: Patients were enrolled by signing a consent form prior to transplantation. Three months following transplantation, upon consent, patients were allocated to the SYT group. Patients who were not interested in taking SYT were allocated to the control group. Both groups continued to receive standard biomedical care from their oncologist. Patients allocated to the treatment group were to receive a batch of SYT once each month for a duration of 6 months. Peripheral blood samples were collected and analyzed on a monthly basis.
